judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
 ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
 COMPANY PETITION NO.404 OF 1986
 -------------------------------------------------------
 Office Notes, Office
 Memorandum of Coram, Court s or Judge s orders
 Appearance, Court s orders
 or direction and
 Prothonotary s orders
 -------------------------------------------------------
 Mr.Jal Audhyrujine i/by Malvi
 Ranchoddas for Modella Woolens.
 Mr.P.Ramarao O.L. present.
 Coram : R.S.Mohite,J
Coram : R.S.Mohite,J
Coram : R.S.Mohite,J
 Date : 12.10.2006.
 PC
 1. Heard Advocate for M/s.Modela
 Woolens Ltd., and the Official
 Liquidator. For the reasons which
 are mentioned in the report, the
 same is made absolute in terms of
 prayer clauses-(a) and (b) subject
 to the modification that the
 refund shall be for the amount of
 Rs.76,34,490 alongwith actual
 interest which may have accrued
 thereon. Payment shall be made
 within 2 weeks. Report disposed
 off.
 (R.S.Mohite,J)
(R.S.Mohite,J)
(R.S.Mohite,J)
